synopsis.text:
And so begins the extraordinary tale of Takamiya Honoka, an ordinary student whose life takes a dramatic turn when he discovers that his classmate, the enigmatic and captivating Ayaka Kagari, is not just a school idol but a powerful fire witch sworn to protect him. Sitting next to Ayaka in class and sharing the same bus every morning, Honoka's only concern had been navigating the treacherous waters of her fan club's jealousy. Little did he know that Ayaka's true purpose in life was to shield him from harm, a secret she kept hidden until the day a falling school building forced her to reveal her magical powers.

As Honoka delves deeper into Ayaka's world, he learns that she is not the only witch in their midst, and that many of his classmates harbor their own supernatural secrets. Caught in the crossfire of a hidden war between the Workshop Witches and the Tower Witches, Honoka must now balance his mundane school life with the fantastical world of magic, all while trying to understand the true nature of the power hidden within him. With Ayaka by his side, Honoka embarks on a thrilling journey filled with danger, romance, and self-discovery in this enchanting anime.
